By using this application you need to allow access for sending SMS
Sorry, but for us your consent is used as legal basis, we are exceptionally ethical!
OMG! I am concerned, that without your consent to use SMS, our app can not work correctly.
By pressing this button you will show current ticket to inspector
Tiket is an app, which makes buying your transportation ticket quick and easy. Everything is one click away!
Do you want to send SMS?
Your ticket has expired, please buy a new one
There is 5 minutes left for ticket to expire
Consider allowing access to location, you will enjoy our app with better experience, we do not collect data about location
This city is not available for Tiket
